snippet: Scottish nationalists may have at least an outside chance of gaining popular support for the end of constitutional ties with Britain in a referendum within the next two or three years.
lead_paragraph: Scottish nationalists may have at least an outside chance of gaining popular support for the end of constitutional ties with Britain in a referendum within the next two or three years.

headline.seo: Scottish Independence Movement Draws Renewed Sparring
headline.main: Renewed Sparring Over Scottish Independence Movement
headline.print_headline: Renewed Sparring Over Scottish Independence Movement
